wikipedia_page.main:
Ashley Steven Jackson (born 27 August 1987) is a retired English field hockey player who plays as a midfielder for Old Georgians'. He has represented the England and Great Britain national teams since 2006. 
On 23 March 2021 it was announced that he would be "stepping away" from International hockey. In December 2014 Jackson began playing ice hockey for Invicta Dynamos, scoring a goal on his debut against London Raiders. In June 2017, together with his brother, Wesley Jackson, he founded Jackson coaching.

response: * Ashley Jackson, GB Olympic hockey player Member of Bronze medal winning England men's hockey team, Commonwealth Games 2014

Whilst the club's youth system produced some great players over the years, the club also gained some top class talent from other clubs. Arguably the most talented of these players was former Milton Keynes Hockey Club goalkeeper, Tristan Andrews. He joined the club having represented Buckinghamshire County through juniors to senior level where he saved a drag flick from Ashley Jackson. This among many other of his hockey exploits can be heard frequently recalled at club functions.
* Ashley Jackson - World Young Player of the Year Award 2009
